title: Circle of Death
content:
Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: CON Save

How to Acquire Circle of Death

Circle of Death can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard Circle of Death can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard
